//: graphql-code-generator is locked on 0.10.5 because of bc break https://github.com/dotansimha/graphql-code-generator/pull/444/files#r207878190
name: cms-api

scripts.prebuild-tenant-api: env CODEGEN_IMMUTABLE_TYPES=1 npx gql-gen --require ts-node/register --schema ./src/tenant-api/schema/tenant.graphql.ts --template typescript --skip-documents --out ./src/tenant-api/schema/types.ts
scripts.prebuild-system-api: env CODEGEN_IMMUTABLE_TYPES=1 npx gql-gen --require ts-node/register --schema ./src/system-api/schema/system.graphql.ts --template typescript --skip-documents --out ./src/system-api/schema/types.ts
scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild-tenant-api && prebuild-system-api && mkdir -p dist && find ./tests/ -name '*.gql' -type f -exec cp --parents {} ./dist \;
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build && npm run test
